dcterms:description: WoodScape is the world’s first public surround view fisheye automotive dataset released to accelerate research in multi-task multi-camera computer vision for automated driving. It consists of annotations for nine tasks, including segmentation, depth estimation, bounding boxes, pixel level motion masks, and a novel lens soiling detection task, with semantic instances for 40+ classes provided for over 10,000 images.
dcterms:title: WoodScape

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: The Oxford Robotcar dataset provides fisheye camera images for autonomous driving, containing over 100 repetitions of a consistent route through Oxford, UK, captured over a period of over a year. It is widely used for long-term localisation and mapping.
dcterms:title: Oxford Robotcar Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. R. Sekkat
Y. Dupuis
P. Vasseur
P. Honeine
dcterms:description: OmniScape is a synthetic dataset providing semantic segmentation annotations for cameras mounted on a motorcycle.
dcterms:title: OmniScape
